hero.title: Developer
hero.subtitle: Hello, I'm Tailison Ramos
hero.overview: Fullstack developer and student looking to specialize in mobile applications using tools like

prepcars.description: A car ads platform. Easy and simple to use. Where the user can make their ad and interact with other advertisers, favoriting their cars and saving their favorites.

encurtando.description: It is a link shortener and QRcode generator. Kind and friendly to the user, it focuses on what it proposes. Shorten links.

tailisonDev.description: My first portfolio. Here, I used the skills I have acquired so far to introduce myself to you. I hope you like it!

skills.title: Hard Skills
skills.overview: For the creation of my projects, I use most of the tools above. I also seek to explore other languages and frameworks to keep myself updated and able to develop innovative projects.

whoIam.title: Who am I?
whoIam.description: I am an aspiring full-stack developer passionate about technology and innovation.

whatIamDoing.title: What am I doing?
whatIamDoing.description: Currently, I am studying Systems Analysis and Development to expand my knowledge and improve my skills in web development.

whatAmIworkingOn.title: What am I working on?
whatAmIworkingOn.description: I am focused on learning best practices using React/Native in creating modern and reusable interfaces. For the creation of complete projects, I seek knowledge in SQL and NoSQL languages, such as Postgres and Firebase, using NodeJs on the server.

formSuccess.title: It will be a pleasure to answer you
